author: John Doe
title: Understanding React Hooks
line_description: A quick guide to understanding the basics of React hooks.
content:
# React Hooks
React hooks allow you to use **state** and _other React features_ in functional components.

Here's how you can use `useState`:

```javascript
const [count, setCount] = useState(0);
```

For more information, check the [React documentation](https://reactjs.org).
